item.title: Unreal: Creating static mesh assets from C++
item.description: I was looking for information on creating static mesh assets in Unreal from C++, and found a blog post that covered exactly that… in version 4.16. I was working on an editor plugin for Unreal 5.0.1, and there were a few changes needed before it would compile. Before I get into what I had to change, here’s the sample; it creates a pyramid shape from a set of vertices with positions and UVs, and lets Unreal compute the normals and tangents.
